history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: EXTypei. qsimpl time: 1 use: EXTypei.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type e0 : A -> Ens P : Ens -> Prop e : Ens H : forall a : A, IN e (Comp (e0 a) P) -> IN e (e0 a) x : sig A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) Hx : EQ e (sig_rect A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) (fun _ : sig A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) => Ens) (fun (x : A) (_ : P (e0 x)) => e0 x) x) The term "x" has type "sig A (fun x : A => P (e0 x))" while it is expected to have type "A".

In environment H0 : forall (P : Type) (Q : P -> Prop) (x : P), Q x -> EXType P Q A : Type e0 : A -> Ens P : Ens -> Prop e : Ens H : forall a : A, IN e (Comp (e0 a) P) -> IN e (e0 a) x : sig A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) Hx : EQ e (sig_rect A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) (fun _ : sig A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) => Ens) (fun (x : A) (_ : P (e0 x)) => e0 x) x) Unable to unify "EQ e (sig_rect A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) (fun _ : sig A (fun x : A => P (e0 x)) => Ens) (fun (x : A) (_ : P (e0 x)) => e0 x) x)" with "EXType A (fun y : A => EQ e (e0 y))".

original: intros E P e. induction E using Ens_ind. -- simpl. intros [x Hx]. apply EXTypei with x. apply Hx.
